academic_programs.program_name: Bachelor of Science in Computer Science
academic_programs.eligibility_criteria: High school diploma with a minimum GPA of 3.5. Must have completed advanced mathematics and science courses.

academic_programs.program_name: Bachelor of Arts in English Literature
academic_programs.eligibility_criteria: High school diploma with a minimum GPA of 3.2. Strong written and verbal communication skills.
Bachelor's degree from an accredited institution with a minimum GPA of 3.0. At least 2 years of relevant work experience. GMAT/GRE scores required.
required_documents: Official transcripts from all post-secondary institutions

academic_programs.program_name: Master of Science in Data Science
academic_programs.eligibility_criteria: Bachelor's degree in a quantitative field (e.g., computer science, statistics, mathematics) with a minimum GPA of 3.3. Prior programming experience is essential.
